title: FS - PSA graded T206 Kling (Price reduced) and Overall (Sold)

posts.post_title: FS - PSA graded T206 Kling (Price reduced) and Overall (Sold)
posts.post_content:
For Sale 2 very nice T206's:

Johnny Kling Portrait P350 PSA 2 - Great color and focus. $175 pp ff, includes shipping.

Orval Overall Portrait P150 - PSA 1(mk). Card has a small stamped "P" on front and I believe a large "JS" stamped on back. Card is extremely sharp and presents well. $OLD  pp ff, includes shipping.
